title: There Should be a Monthly Reset for chests
body:
I Think people should be able to earn chests  when getting an [-S OR HIGHER] every month/event because i hate it that i'm having to wait a year until my next chest i get they want me too play more champs but i love the champs that i play already, and i also feel like i am not getting rewarded for doing well, and i want to see something like a mastery orb or something else.

TY for your Opinion
